name: Pirates of the Metaverse by Drip Studios

metadata.name: POTM #1
metadata.description:
Thrust into a strange future by tragedy and twist of fate, Ethero Caspain must rally a crew of degen pirates to help him locate the most coveted treasure in all the metaverse: a key rumored to unlock inter-dimensional travel.

Pirates of the Metaverseâ„¢ by Drip Studios is a collection of 10,000 digitally unique NFTs about to embark on an uncharted journey across blockchains.
